title: Those Who Provide
description: Nala is about to embark on his first goblin raid. He has passed all of the tests for Those Who Provide and is ready to breach the surface world where staying out of sight of the humans is essential for survival. Surrounded by experienced raiders, Nala has only to play his role and stay near the cavern entrance. But raiding swine herds can be unpredictable...
author: Jaq D. Hawkins
